name: The Mysterious Case of the Windview Monster
name_original: The Mysterious Case of the Windview Monster
description:
You work as a park ranger, set to debunk all theories about a creature running around your park! Meet concerned citizens and convince them there's nothing to be afraid of... you think. 

CONTROLS

  • WASD to move. 
  • Mouse to look around. Left click to interact/progress narrative.

Developed for Global Game Jam 2021: some tweaks and improvements have happened since! Original Submission Page.

CREDITS

  • Olivia Dunlap (twitter: @ocdunlap) - Programmer, Technical Artist, Narrative Designer/Writer
  • Brent Oakes (twitter: @brenteldorf) - Cryptid Programmer, Cryptid 3D Artist
  • Samantha Ortiz (twitter: @samloveskirby) - Narrative Designer/Writer
  • Joe Bretz (twitter: @reverbinthevoid) - Sound Designer

TOOLS AND ASSETS

  • Fungus by Fungus Games 
  • Gaia 2 by Procedural Worlds 
  • Low Poly Ultimate Pack by polyperfect 
  • POLYGON - Nature Pack by Synty Studios
